recipe.ingredients: - chickpeas (cooked or canned, rinsed and drained): 2 cups - coconut milk: 1 can (400 ml) - diced tomatoes: 1 can (14 ounces) - onions (chopped): 1 large - garlic cloves (minced): 3 - fresh ginger (grated): 1 tablespoon - olive oil: 2 tablespoons - garam masala: 1 tablespoon - turmeric: 1 teaspoon - cumin seeds: 1 teaspoon - coriander powder: 1 teaspoon - red chili powder: 1/2 teaspoon (adjust according to taste) - salt: 1 teaspoon - fresh cilantro (chopped, for garnish): 1/4 cup
recipe.directions: 1. Heat Oil: In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the cumin seeds and allow them to sizzle for a few seconds. 2. Sauté Veggies: Add the chopped onions, minced garlic, and grated ginger. Sauté until the onions turn translucent and the raw smell of garlic and ginger goes away. 3. Add Spices: Stir in garam masala, turmeric, coriander powder, red chili powder, and salt. Mix well and cook for about a minute to allow the spices to release their flavors. 4. Mix Chickpeas and Tomatoes: Add the rinsed chickpeas and diced tomatoes to the skillet. Stir well, ensuring that the chickpeas are coated with the spice mixture. 5. Add Coconut Milk: Pour in the coconut milk and mix well. Bring the curry to a boil, then reduce the heat and let it simmer for 10-15 minutes until the curry thickens. 6. Garnish and Serve: Remove from heat and garnish with chopped fresh cilantro. Serve hot with basmati rice or naan bread.
recipe.nutrition: Total Carbohydrate: 45g, Dietary Fiber: 12g, Sodium: 400mg, Saturated Fat: 11g, Total Fat: 18g, Protein: 11g, Added Sugars: 0g, Total Sugars: 6g
recipe.total_calories_estimation: - Total Calories for entire recipe : Approximately 1122 calories for the entire recipe. - Calories for each ingredient: Chickpeas: 364 calories for 2 cups Coconut Milk: 552 calories per can Diced Tomatoes: 94 calories per can Onion: 46 calories for 1 large Garlic: Negligible Ginger: Negligible Olive Oil: 239 calories per 2 tablespoons Garam Masala, Turmeric, Cumin Seeds, Coriander, Red Chili Powder, Salt: Negligible Cilantro: Negligible - Serving People: 4
